SB1 - Public School Finance

Author: Creighton Status: Filed

Bill Summary

This bill relates to public school finance and establishes new funding formulas for Texas public schools. The legislation aims to provide equitable funding across all school districts and increase per-pupil spending.

Bill Text

AN ACT relating to public school finance.

BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF TEXAS:

SECTION 1. Chapter 42, Education Code, is amended by adding Section 42.001 to read as follows:

Sec. 42.001. FUNDING FORMULA. (a) The commissioner shall establish a new funding formula that ensures equitable distribution of state funds to school districts.

(b) The formula must account for student enrollment, district wealth, and special population needs.

SECTION 2. This Act takes effect September 1, 2024.
